docblock.description: An interface to be implemented by the App class that represents a user when interacting with the Login module
Interfaced method to be implemented by the App class that represents a user when interacting with the Login module. Loads a user with the given $userId

param.description: The user id of the user to load

return.description: True if the user could be loaded ok, or false if the load failed, or the user does not exists.

docblock.description: Interfaced method to be implemented by the App class that represents a user when interacting with the Login module. Loads a user with the given $userName. $userName is whatever is required to the user as username; normally, an email or a username.

param.description: The username of the user to load. Usually, an email or a username.

return.description: True if the user could be loaded ok, or false if the load failed, or the user does not exists.

docblock.description: Interfaced method to be implemented by the App class that represents a user when interacting with the Login module. Returns the loaded user's encrypted password to be checked by the Login module.

return.description: The user's encrypted password, false if doesn't has one or if the user can't login.

description.compact: Interfaced method to be implemented by the App class that represents a user when interacting with the Login module.

docblock.description: It performs any initialization needed for the user object when it represents a successfully logged in user.
